name: masterportal

scripts.createSSLCert: openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout devtools/certificate/localhost.key -out devtools/certificate/localhost.pem -config devtools/certificate/req.cnf -sha256
scripts.versionHotfix: npm version patch && npm run versionLatest && git tag -d lts && git push --tags -f --no-verify
scripts.versionMinor: npm version minor && npm run versionLatest && git tag -d lts && git push --tags -f --no-verify
scripts.versionMajor: npm version major && npm run versionLatest && git tag -d lts && git push --tags -f --no-verify
scripts.versionHotfix:all: npm run versionHotfix && cd addons && npm run versionHotfix && cd .. && cd portalconfigs && npm run versionHotfix && cd ..
scripts.versionMinor:all: npm run versionMinor && cd addons && npm run versionMinor && cd .. && cd portalconfigs && npm run versionMinor && cd ..
scripts.versionMajor:all: npm run versionMajor && cd addons && npm run versionMajor && cd .. && cd portalconfigs && npm run versionMajor && cd ..
scripts.prePushHook: node ./node_modules/@masterportal/mpconfigparser/cli.js docs/User/Portal-Config/config.json.md docs/User/Portal-Config/config.json.de.md && eslint --max-warnings 0 "./**/*.{vue,js}" && npm run test

@comment dependencies and devDependencie: These are the comments for the `dependencies` and for the `devDependencies` section.
All packages without a ^ or a x stay do not update the version, reasons see below.

@comment dependencies and devDependencie.https-proxy-agent: after 5.0.1 https-proxy-agent is now a native Node ECMAScript module
@comment dependencies and devDependencie.imports-loader: last version that supports webpack version 4
@comment dependencies and devDependencie.inquirer: after 8.2.4 Inquirer is now a native Node ECMAScript module
@comment dependencies and devDependencie.replace-in-file: 8.0.0 is now a native Node ECMAScript module
@comment dependencies and devDependencie.mini-css-extract-plugin: after 0.9.0: several breaking changes https://github.com/webpack-contrib/mini-css-extract-plugin/releases/tag/v1.0.0, after 1.0.0 : webpack 5
@comment dependencies and devDependencie.webpack: remains on version 4 until switched to version 5
